external_games.name: V! Yuusha no Kuse ni Namaikida R

name: V! Yuusha no Kuse ni Namaikida R
summary: Become the God of Destruction in a unique real time strategy game utilizing PS VR. Breed monsters to invade human territories, seen in a diorama-like view through the eyes of the God of Destruction. Together with Badman and Badmella, work towards total world domination!
